This package provides public datasets to help you learn and use R to study how financial assets align to climate scenarios; it supports the implementation in R of the software 'PACTA' (Paris Agreement Capital Transition Assessment; <https://2degrees-investing.org/>).

## Installation

Install the released version of r2dii.data from CRAN with:

```r
install.packages("r2dii.data")
```

Or install the development version of r2dii.data with something like this:

```r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/r2dii.data")
```

[How to minimize installation errors?](https://gist.github.com/maurolepore/a0187be9d40aee95a43f20a85f4caed6#installation)

## Example

```{r}
library(r2dii.data)

head(data_dictionary)
```
